verbs.description: Shortly after [ARG0: Trump] [V: won] [ARGM-TMP: in 2016] , Scott Mason , a member of the campaign and Trump 's transition team , was hired as a senior policy advisor at Holland & Knight , which brought in a record amount of lobbying fees the year after the president 's victory .
